Package com.jdroid.android.leftnavbar

Class Summary
BuildConfig  
LeftNavBar TV-specific implementation of the ActionBar API, using the title bar and a left navigation panel.
LeftNavBarService This service maintains a single instance of LeftNavBar per Activity
LeftNavView Left navigation panel hosting various controls such as tabs.

TabListView Extension of ListView which better handles focus.

VisibilityController Manages the visibility of a view, with optional animations.
